lead_paragraph: SATURDAY'S PUZZLE - We've had a fair number of tough Saturday crosswords over the last few months, and today's offering does nothing to soften the curve. Robert H. Wolfe presents us with a mix of long entries, sly clues and some challenging vocabulary in a wide-open grid.
snippet: Robert H. Wolfe presents us with another of his wide-open wonders.
abstract: Robert H. Wolfe presents us with another of his wide-open wonders.
